      • replaceAttachments

        public void replaceAttachments(java.lang.String[] p_allAtachments)
        Replaces all attachments with the ones in the parameters. This method will override any attachment given before.
        Parameters:
        p_allAtachments - The new attachments paths.

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String p_ArgumentToGet)
        Returns a property of this Mail.
        Parameters:
        p_ArgumentToGet - The property to get.
        Returns:
        The requested property, most times a String but not always. It is also possible to get an Integer, a Date or a String[].
